name: Zaba The Frog
description: Zaba The Frog is a 2D platformer game focused on quick and challenging gameplay. Your job as a player, is to help not very smart, lazy frog. Goal of each level is to collect enough flies and reach the exit portal. Be aware that as frog eats, it’s becoming bigger and it’s easier to die.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Celeron 2.4 Ghz Memory: 768 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT 256mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
